lines.text: Doctor, you're an expert on medical science. Isn't it true that the Ancient Romans were pain worshippers?
Oh, yes, Herr Count. They even held endurance contests. It was a mark of distinction to suffer in silence.

[Being treated for an arm wound by Dr. Meissen]
Ah, naaah! Oh, no!

[Screaming]
Aaah, ah, ah! I'm not an Ancient Roman!
Herr Count, Mr. Beckett is here.
Well, bring him in for this should amuse him too.

[to Dr. Meissen]
Ooohh! - You idiot! You call yourself a doctor?

[Sadistically twisting Steiken's arm]
And you? You call yourself a man?
I can condone poor swordsmanship but not bad manners. Gentlemen, Mr. Fender will accept your apologies
lines.character: Sir Ronald Burton, alias Richard Beckett
